title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Large square or "mezzaro" in a design of a hillock and a large-scale tree in the central panel with surrounding animals and birds. Border has flowers and small trees. In blue, red, brown, magenta and black.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Anonymous Donor. a-t-9.
